main.bio: Hi there! I am Cindy. I am a Front-End Developer with 2+ years of experience in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Vue. Currently, I am developing a B2B customer service system at ASUS and am committed to continuous learning. I collaborate closely with back-end developers to implement user-friendly interfaces and integrate with APIs to deliver a seamless experience for our customers.
